legal_citations: Transfer of Undertakings (Protection of Employment) Regulations 2006 (as amended)

content.title: TUPE TRANSFER NOTIFICATION
content.body:
[EMPLOYER_NAME] (Transferor)
[EMPLOYER_ADDRESS]

[DATE]

[EMPLOYEE_NAME]
[EMPLOYEE_ADDRESS]

Dear [EMPLOYEE_NAME],

Re: Transfer of Employment under TUPE Regulations 2006

I am writing to inform you of a proposed transfer of your employment which will be governed by the Transfer of Undertakings (Protection of Employment) Regulations 2006 (TUPE).

Transfer Details:
- Transfer date: [TRANSFER_DATE]
- Transferee (new employer): [TRANSFEREE_NAME], [TRANSFEREE_ADDRESS]
- Reason for transfer: [REASON - e.g., business sale, service provision change]

What TUPE Means for You:

Under TUPE, your employment will automatically transfer to [TRANSFEREE_NAME] on [TRANSFER_DATE]. Your terms and conditions of employment will transfer and be protected, including:

- Continuity of employment (your service date remains [SERVICE_START_DATE])
- Salary, benefits, and contractual terms
- Accrued holiday entitlement
- Pension rights (subject to specific pension provisions)

Measures:
[TRANSFEROR_MEASURES - e.g., None planned by current employer]
[TRANSFEREE_MEASURES - e.g., The new employer plans to [DESCRIBE CHANGES]]

Implications:
[IMPLICATIONS_DESCRIPTION]

Information Provided:

The following information about the transfer has been provided:
- Fact and proposed date of transfer: [TRANSFER_DATE]
- Reasons for transfer: [REASONS]
- Legal, economic, and social implications: [IMPLICATIONS]
- Measures planned by transferor: [TRANSFEROR_MEASURES]
- Measures planned by transferee: [TRANSFEREE_MEASURES]

Employee Liability Information (ELI):

We have provided [TRANSFEREE_NAME] with employee liability information including your age, identity, employment details, and terms of employment at least 28 days before transfer (or as soon as reasonably practicable).

Consultation:

[IF MEASURES PLANNED: We will consult with you about the proposed measures. A consultation meeting is scheduled for [CONSULTATION_DATE].]

[IF NO MEASURES: No measures are planned that will affect you, so no formal consultation is required. However, you may discuss any concerns with [CONTACT_PERSON].]

Right to Object:

You have the right to object to the transfer of your employment. If you object:
- Your employment will terminate on [TRANSFER_DATE]
- You will NOT transfer to the new employer  
- You will NOT be entitled to a redundancy payment
- You will receive payment for work up to [TRANSFER_DATE] and accrued holiday

If you wish to object, you must notify [CONTACT_PERSON] in writing by [OBJECTION_DEADLINE].

Pensions:

[PENSION_INFORMATION - Note: Occupational pension rights do not transfer under TUPE but the transferee must provide minimum pension provision]

Questions:

A Q&A document is enclosed. If you have further questions, please contact [CONTACT_PERSON] or attend the information session on [INFO_SESSION_DATE].

Yours sincerely,

[SIGNATORY_NAME]
[SIGNATORY_TITLE]

compliance_checklist: Notification given in reasonable time before transfer
All required information provided (fact, date, reasons, implications, measures)
ELI provided to transferee at least 28 days before transfer
